name: Dungeon Adventure (itch) (Evanator98)
description:
Dungeon Adventure is a dungeon crawler similar to the old MS-DOS Advanced D&D games (Eye of the Beholder, etc.),  where the player can travel through the dungeon and attempt to escape the maze!    My main focus on this Game Jam was to make something that was playable while also implementing some graphical effects.  Stencils to highlight entities, bloom to create slightly more dynamic/interesting lighting, decals, and LOD were my main topics of focus.

I can be reached at: evan.sinasac@gmail.com
